statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Deposit';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_description FROM transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_amount, transaction_description FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_type, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT DISTINCT transaction_type FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE deposit_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT amount, deposit_date FROM deposits WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT account_id, deposit_date FROM deposits ORDER BY deposit_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' AND amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, account_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2023-01-01' AND transaction_date < '2023-02-01';
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT deposit_id, amount, deposit_date FROM deposits WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT account_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY account_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM deposits;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM withdrawals WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_account_id, receiver_account_id FROM transfers WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount <= 5000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transfers GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT deposit_id, account_id, amount FROM deposits WHERE account_id = 12345;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM deposits WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, sender_account_id, receiver_account_id, amount FROM transfers WHERE amount <= 500 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM withdrawals WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM deposits;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM transfers WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT deposit_id, amount, account_id FROM deposits WHERE deposit_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount <= 500 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM withdrawals WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM deposits ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM withdrawals WHERE amount > 1000 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2021-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT payment_id, amount, timestamp FROM payments ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transfer_id, from_account_id, to_account_id, amount, timestamp FROM transfers WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 7;
SELECT * FROM deposits;
SELECT deposit_id, amount, deposit_date FROM deposits WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT account_id, amount FROM withdrawals WHERE withdrawal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM transfers WHERE amount = 500 AND transfer_date > '2022-03-15';
SELECT payment_id, account_id, payment_type FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM deposits WHERE deposit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT account_id, amount FROM withdrawals WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY withdrawal_date DESC;
SELECT transfer_id, from_account_id, to_account_id, amount FROM transfers WHERE transfer_date >= '2022-03-01' ORDER BY amount DESC, transfer_date ASC;
SELECT payment_id, account_id, amount, payment_type FROM payments WHERE payment_type = 'Credit' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, table_name, action, timestamp FROM audit_log WHERE table_name IN ('deposits', 'transfers') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
